about_the_game:
Raise Adorable Animals & Uncover Genetic Surprises

From tiny chicks to powerful cows, every critter earns its keep as they level up—chop wood with a horse, race a feisty chicken, or even befriend lively slimes! Breed pets across generations to unlock rare colors and patterns, ensuring your farm is always abuzz with excitement. Why settle for a standard cow when you could have a dazzling midnight-blue one?

Cozy Quality-of-Life Delights

We’ve streamlined the everyday tasks so you can focus on the fun:

  • No Forced Bedtime: Run your farm ’til dawn—no abrupt pass-outs here.

  • Overflow Storage: Extra items sail into your shed automatically, sparing you those “inventory full” dilemmas.

  • Tools Level by Use: Watch them grow stronger simply by doing your daily chores.

  • Adjustable Game Speed: Set a leisurely pace for relaxed afternoons or speed up when you crave efficiency.

  • Frequent Dev Updates & Fan Polls: Shape Cornucopia's future and enjoy swift bug fixes and lively new content.

Grow 74 Crops, 50 Fruit Trees & 15 Berry Bushes—Powered by NPK Compost

Whether you’re fine-tuning soil with nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium or simply sowing seeds at your own pace, Cornucopia has you covered. Craving majestic pumpkins and supersized strawberries? NPK is your key to abundant harvests. Prefer a laid-back approach? Plant, water, and let nature unfold—your farm, your rules! Best of all, every seed hides special growth, yield, and secret multipliers shaped by season, soil type, compost levels, and more—it's astounding what surprises can sprout when you plant with care!

Magic in the Family: Hidden Children & More

Marriage is only your first chapter. Children grow from cuddly Baby to inquisitive Toddler to adventurous Child. Better still, certain unions yield extraordinary kids—wizard children, spirit offspring, goddess little ones, or even kappa tots for truly enchanting family moments. And with 34+ marriage candidates—spanning young adults to sprightly elders—you’re sure to find a love story that’s all your own!

Magic in the Cards: Buffs, Quests & More

Ready to add an extra spark to your daily adventures? Collect card packs and discover anything from Double Jump or Less Gravity buffs to handy General Store Discounts that keep your shopping budget in check. Feeling bold? Equip Increased Critical Hit Rate, Breathe Underwater, or Auto Revive to conquer dungeons with ease!

There are even monster quest cards for vanquishing baddies and NPC quest cards that encourage heart-to-heart chats with neighbors. Each card type brings a new layer of fun—fire them up anytime and watch your farm life reach new heights!

Replayable Adventures & Surprising Twists

No two playthroughs are alike. Birthdays shuffle, favorite gifts shift, and animals arrive with unique quirks—every run becomes a whole new tale!

  • Randomized NPC Birthdays & Gifts: Each save scrambles birthdays for your 50+ neighbors, plus assigns them 2 brand-new favorite items.

  • Unique Gear Bonuses: Weapons and hats spawn with random stats each run—making every find feel like a mini treasure hunt!

  • Animal Quirks & Special Skills: Livestock arrives with 2 favorite foods, 2 disliked foods, and 4 unlockable abilities. Breed them to pass along powerful genes, forging surprising combos across generations.

  • Procedural Depth & Enemy Rarities: Brave 5 procedural areas teeming with normal, uncommon, rare, and legendary foes. Each tier promises richer loot and tougher battles—plus hidden bonus rooms brimming with treasure and refightable bosses to keep every run thrilling!

Lose Yourself in a Stunning 2.5D Landscape

Swing the camera close for cozy details or zoom out for breathtaking panoramas. Each day reveals whimsical sights—from blossoming berry rows to vibrant orchard canopies. Mix, match, and plan your layouts in a world that lets you see everything from fresh angles.

Secure Extra Homes & Upgrade Everything

Start with a modest house and a spacious storage shed—perfect for tucking away all those harvests. Need even more room? Upgrade your shed to expand its capacity, then push your barn and chicken coop to new heights, and repair the greenhouse for special growth multipliers on veggies—plus an extra boost for those hybrid watermelons! Craving fresh scenery? Snag a Beach Villa, Treehouse, or Pine Hideaway—each tucked away in its own picturesque nook. Make every corner of this land your personal paradise!

Find Friendship & Freedom—Even in Their Rooms

With 50+ townsfolk to charm, you’ll uncover countless stories and daily surprises. Raise hearts high enough, and you’ll unlock their rooms for redecorating or a bit of furniture “borrowing.” Every conversation, gift, and silly anecdote strengthens a bond that turns neighbors into lifelong friends—or perhaps more!

Fast Travel & Handy Maps

Skip the long treks and jump between fast travel waypoints as soon as you discover them. Need to deliver a gift on the far side of town? Your map shows which villagers are outside their homes—no more fruitless hunts or missed birthdays. Zip around and get things done on your schedule!

Pachinko-Style Fishing & Arcade Antics

Enjoy a fun twist on classic angling with our bounce-based fishing. Cast bobbers, watch them zigzag, and reel in everything from common catches to bizarre treasures. Then pop over to the Arcade, brimming with 10+ original mini-games—including a lava coin-pusher, claw machine, cave rescue shooter, snowball fight, and scratch-off cards that reveal hidden rewards. Feeling competitive? Train your pets at the racetrack and watch them compete in thrilling races for prizes and bragging rights!

Tackle Bosses with 11+ Weapon Classes

Fancy an adventure after chores? Grab any of 11+ distinct weapon styles and test your mettle against 5 unique bosses. Raid hidden realms, claim epic loot, and still be back before bedtime—if you choose to sleep at all!

90+ Hats: Fashion & Function Unite

Complete your look with 90+ whimsical hats. Some add style, some lend stat boosts, and all show off your personality. Whether it’s a silly beret or a rugged mining helmet, pick what suits your mood—or your mission!

Celebrate Year-Round Festivals & Make New Memories

Who says farm life can’t be festive? Whether you’re brewing fresh dishes for the Cooking Festival, hunting hidden eggs at the Chicken Festival, or cozying up under a sky of fireworks, there’s always a celebration around the corner. Each event brings special experiences, seasonal music, and delightful moments—perfect for bonding with neighbors or completing those NPC quest cards!

Don’t forget to check your calendar—festivals begin at dawn, and time stands still once you join the fun.

Spin the Auction House & Score Rare Finds

Competition meets community fun at the Auction House! Outbid rivals for rare animal genetics, prized resources, or special collectibles that spark envy all over town. Flex those bidding muscles and celebrate each triumphant grab!

200+ Delicious Recipes to Master

Ready to heat up the kitchen? Cook over 200+ mouthwatering dishes, from hearty meals that fuel long farm days to gourmet feasts that wow neighbors. Toss in rare monster drops for extra zing—or whip up sweet treats that pair perfectly with a lazy afternoon.

Exquisite Hand-Crafted Soundtrack

Immerse yourself in an original music collection with 72 enchanting tracks that perfectly complement your journey.

97 Achievements, 5 Cornucopia Badges & Endless Relaxation

Show off 97 achievements and gather 5 exclusive Cornucopia Badges. Frequent updates keep the world fresh, while a no-pressure bedtime ensures you set your own pace. Drift into each day as you please, level up your tools, and savor the charm of farm life—no ticking clock in sight!

Write Your Own Farm Tale—Starting Now!

From small fields to legendary estate, every choice in Cornucopia shapes your unique adventure. Adopt new creatures, nurture magical children, discover brand-new harvests, and forge unbreakable bonds. Dive in and watch the seeds of possibility flourish!

       The farm life of your dreams is just a click away—don’t wait another sunrise!
detailed_description:
MEET THE DATEABLES!


JOIN OUR COMMUNITY!

"Cornucopia"® is a registered trademark of Subconscious Games Inc. All rights reserved.

This game and all related materials, including all graphics, text, images, software, audio, and video, are protected under applicable intellectual property laws and are owned by Subconscious Games Inc. Unauthorized use, duplication, or distribution is strictly prohibited.
name: Cornucopia®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews:
“Thank you for creating such an awesome game, this is incredible, very unique and I love it!”
Sharky Games

“It's such a hidden gem, no one talks about it but it's so fun!”
Josh's Gaming Garden

“It’s really good, it’s actually really good, and it feels like there actually is a lot of detail in the game.”
Payton's Corner
short_description: A nostalgic 2.5D farm sim with 74 exotic crops, loyal pets bred for amazing genetics, and 34+ marriage candidates—from spirited youths to wise elders. Master NPK compost, raise magical kids, conquer dungeons, and delight in whimsical scratch-card arcade fun. Your cozy story starts now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Norwegian, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese
